item.title: Whonix VirtualBox 14.0.0.9.3 - Point Release - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Closing this thread because this version has just been released.

Whonix 14.0.0.9.3 for VirtualBox with KDE has been released! - Point Release News
This is a point release. A point release is not a separate, new version of Whonix. Instead, it is a re-release of Whonix which is inclusive of all updates up to a certain point. Installing any version of Whonix 14 and fully updating it leads to a system which is identical to installing a Whonix point release. If the Whonix installation is updated, no further action is required. Regardless of the current installed version of Whonix, if users wish to install (or reinstall) Whonix for any reas…

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix VirtualBox 14.0.0.9.3 - Point Release - Testers Wanted!

Will be fixed later in package upgrades. Probably no new build just for this.

Whonix in VirtualBox - Testers Only Version

Download KVM:

This is a release candidate for a point release.

Whonix

Point Release

What is a Point Release?

This release is still based on KDE. For the (non-)future of Whonix KDE and likely replacement by Whonix XFCE in future, see:

User Poll - XFCE vs KDE - KDE Deprecation Considered! News
Community Poll: Deprecate KDE in favor of XFCE in Non-Qubes-Whonix? The Whonix team is interested in polling the community’s preferred desktop environment. Whonix KDE Whonix XFCE 0 voters Why consider changing? Whonix bundled with an XFCE desktop environment is in development. This raises some questions: Do users generally prefer the KDE desktop environment over XFCE (or vice-versa)? When a Whonix XFCE variant becomes available, will users continue using KDE in Whonix or make …

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Whonix_Release_Notes#Whonix_14
